dataList.dlg: Equal death to something or... Tch. Whatever, I'm here to break stuff.
Dammit... Who was the one that kept sleeping while their alarm was ringing? I'll make 'em pay...
For lunch... I'd like something raw. The kind that's got blood dripping from it.
Ever see a red moon, mate? It's a stoater. I fell in love with it at first sight.
...Worried about my wounds? Bloody hell, that's a right scunner. Don't you ever say that to me again.
If there's no witnesses alive to clype, that's assassination, what more do you need? They won't stop bugging me about it, dammit.
Stabbing the jugular all the time's frankly boring. That's just no fun, is it?
My mates keep saying daft rubbish. All that mince about inner peace or quiet or whatsits... Won't it be best for all of us to just wreck shite and move on?
I like that you turn that clock without complaining too much. That hole someone jabbed through my shoulder the other day must've been a right bugger to heal, too.
Where'd you go? Damn, Ishmael would've spotted them in seconds...
I can keep on butchering 'em until you tell me to stop!
Alright, I'll give you something you won't regret!
I just have to crush everything I see, aye?
Alright, who do you want me to mess up?
Aye, I'll go cut 'em!
How's that, it hurts to death, doesn't it?
Tch...!
Target, removed~
You shouldn't be out in the open if you don't have the skills to handle it.
Look. Process be damned, it all turned out fine and well in the end, aye?
Ain't the first time I'm sent to do work I'm not fit to do.
This was simple. Anything else left for me to stab?
They were all prey to me.
My sword says it ain't done yet! We're going back in, mate!
